author: Chris Ciaccia
title: WHO says coronavirus originated in bats, denies it was 'manipulated or constructed ... in a lab'
description: Amid a swirl in controversy, the World Health Organization said the COVID-19 virus that has resulted in the coronavirus pandemic sweeping the globe originated in bats in the wild and is not man-made or engineered in a lab.
content:
